attributes.action: abolish council tax for pensioners PLEASE READ
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to give pensioners a chance to use what little pension they have to help them survive rather than pay £1000+ a year council tax, not forgetting they have been paying tax all there lives. with the rising costs of gas,electric,water food e.c.t they are being condemed to death and a miserable existance!!!CUT THE TAX SAVE A PENSIONER!!!
